text: Dekho! Tumne bhalayi ki to woh tumhare apne hi liye bhalayi thi, aur burayi ki to woh tumhari apni zaat ke liye burayi saabit hui. Phir jab dusre wadey ka waqt aaya to humne dusre dushmano ko tumpar musallat kiya taa-ke woh tumhare chehre bigaad dein aur masjid (bayt ul maqdis) mein usi tarah ghus jayein jis tarah pehle dushman ghuse thay aur jis cheez par unka haath padey usey tabaah karke rakh dein
